item.title: Mac as Dev Device, Windows as Execution Environment
item.description: A clean, repeatable setup to use Mac for development and Windows as the execution environment using SSH and VS Code.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Gowri Prasad.

I work as an API Gateway and Integration Consultant, helping teams design, secure, and operate large-scale integration platforms.

Over the years, I’ve learned that real expertise doesn’t come from memorizing tools or commands — it comes from understanding how systems behave, fail, and recover in real-world conditions.

This blog is my personal knowledge map:

  • Connecting ideas across APIs, integration, and software engineering
  • Writing to clarify my own understanding
  • Sharing lessons learned from real systems and real problems

If something here helps you think more clearly about a problem, then the blog has done its job.

item.title: Dots, Lines and a Thread. Connecting the dots.
item.description: A practical and personal perspective on how real learning happens in technology—by creating, strengthening, and connecting knowledge dots over time.
